wikipedia_page.main: Percy Toone (27 July 1883 – 4 February 1955) was an English cricketer. He played for Essex between 1912 and 1922.

response: Watson made a single first-class appearance for Sussex against Essex at the County Ground, Hove in the 1920 County Championship. In Sussex's first-innings, he was dismissed for a duck by Johnny Douglas, while in their second-innings he was dismissed for 3 runs by Percy Toone. This was his only major appearance for Sussex.
